publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-24 Margaret Smith: Support for Edinburgh Airport Rail Link—That the Parliament believes that the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link will be good for people, business and the environment; notes that it will be directly accessible from 62 stations across Scotland; further notes that it will remove 1.7 million car trips from our roads by 2026, cutting congestion and carbon emissions; considers that the scheme should be funded by government and from other sources, and calls on the Scottish Executive to continue to fund the link as planned. Supported by: Tavish Scott*, Jim Hume*, Jim Tolson*, Alison McInnes*, Liam McArthur*, Jeremy Purvis*, Iain Smith*, Ross Finnie*, Mike Rumbles*, Mike Pringle*, John Farquhar Munro*, Robert Brown*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Nicol Stephen*, Hugh O’Donnell*

S3M-24 Margaret Smith: Support for Edinburgh Airport Rail Link—That the Parliament believes that the Edinburgh Airport Rail Link will be good for people, business and the environment; notes that it will be directly accessible from 62 stations across Scotland; further notes that it will remove 1.7 million car trips from our roads by 2026, cutting congestion and carbon emissions; considers that the scheme should be funded by government and from other sources, and calls on the Scottish Executive to continue to fund the link as planned. Supported by: Tavish Scott, Jim Hume, Jim Tolson, Alison McInnes, Liam McArthur, Jeremy Purvis, Iain Smith, Ross Finnie, Mike Rumbles, Mike Pringle, John Farquhar Munro, Robert Brown, Mr Jamie Stone, Nicol Stephen, Hugh O’Donnell
S3M-24 Support for Edinburgh Airport Rail Link (lodged on 16 May 2007) Margo MacDonald*
